itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway talk about Tom Cruise’s angry COVID rant on the Mission Impossible set, Andrew Cuomo banning the sale of Confederate Flags in New York, Joel Osteen being a monster piece of sh*t, San Francisco saying Abraham Lincoln didn’t...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway talk about Tom Cruise’s angry COVID rant on the Mission Impossible set, Andrew Cuomo banning the sale of Confederate Flags in New York, Joel Osteen being a monster piece of sh*t, San Francisco saying Abraham Lincoln didn’t do enough to help black people, plus Ross and Dan break down casting for the Pamela Anderson/Tommy Lee bio series and remembering Hope Solo’s b-hole pics.
